title: Dublin
brief_description: A practical guide for anyone intending to travel to Ireland’s capital city. Highlights the major cultural attractions and districts. Provides advice on public transport and accommodation. Indicates the best times to visit the main cultural institutions. Suggests places to eat and what you should expect to pay. Includes information on Trinity College, Grafton Street, Waterford Crystal, Powerscourt Gardens, Aran sweaters, literary pub crawls and fishing trips. Presented by John Guerrasio.
